title: PHPlibxml_disable_entity_loader()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPlibxml_disable_entity_loader()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Enable the ability to load external entities:
<?php
libxml_disable_entity_loader(false)
?>
Definition and Usage
The libxml_disable_entity_loader() function enables the ability to load external entities.
Syntax
libxml_disable_entity_loader(
bool
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
bool
Optional. Disable (TRUE) or enable (FALSE) libxml extensions to load external entities. Default is 
    TRUE
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns the 
bool
parameter
PHP Version:
5.2.11+

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPlibxml_disable_entity_loader()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPlibxml_disable_entity_loader()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples.
